ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail again Friends, Umm money, heheheh thats something you won t see much of Bro until about lvl 25 Im lvl 21 and only have like 230pp in my name and I just
ygData.messageBody:
Hail again Friends,
Umm money, heheheh thats something you won't see much of Bro' until
about lvl 25 Im lvl 21 and only have like 230pp in my name and I just made
all of it at lvl 20 selling Skulls of Jhen'Tra,and runed totem staffs (once
you hit lvl 20 go to Rake Rathtear fight gnoll Ebalmers (easy) for the
skulls and high shamans for the staffs)(also easy) then at night when all
the undead come out fight Dry Bones where you can find small bronze pieces
which sell for a good penny. Okay but for your lvl have no fear I have a
great place for you to make money man take the boat from Eruridan<<<<<<<wait
I can explain this easier whereever you are Qeynos or Euridan take the boat
until you hit thje island withj the cat ppl fight wisp!! great money you get
lightstones and Greater lightstones sell the light stones to the cat vendor
for about 7gp then take the G. Lightstones and sell them to the ppl in
either Euridan or Qeynos try the hills or BB..WARNING: DON"T attack teh
Kerran Beetles(catsa hate it fopr some reason and will attack you.. Also
dont mess with teh spiders they are a bitch poison + hiot hard as hell you
can also fight the zombies on the other side of the dock.....)Umm you may
want to wait till about lvl 10 for wisp but you can try them just use all
your mana to ...??? use your Direct Damage spell forgot the name.Watch out
though wisp will group and that hurts you can fight them all the way to lvl
14:)Then go to freeport and ask me later where to lvl. Oh to any one out
there who can give me a pointer on where to fight at lvl 21 I've tried
mistmoore hard to find a group and tried unrest got tired of the damn
goblins killing me when I had to walk there and trains there are awful. Any
tips??


Krix Mathar
Guardians of Lore
-----Original Message-----
From: EvertorN <evertorn@...>
To: eq-clerics@onelist.com <eq-clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 01, 1999 7:56 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] LVL9 spells and armor


>From: EvertorN <evertorn@...>
>
>Hi, After playing about 3 characters, I decided to make another, and so
>far I really like my cleric. One problem I can't seem to solve is the
>money issue. How did u guys get the spells and armor you needed? I
>figure my lvl 9 spells will cost me near 25pp, and I still have my
>newbie armor, and a rusty warhammer, nothing else...to get all leather
>armor would cost me around 25-30pp...I'm currently lvl 7, and I have
>10pp to my name. It's a start, yes, but no where near where it needs to
>be.
>Even after this, how did you get money for the more exp spells?
>This money issue is driving me crazy.
>
>
>EvertorN
>Level 7 Erudite Cleric
>Proud member of United We Stand/ Honorable Players
